SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi

Interface VirtualMainController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController, MainControllerWrapper
public interface VirtualMainController extends Remote
VirtualMainController allows to define an abstract VirtualMainController's interface that can be used by clients in order to perform RMI calls on methods that requires the VirtualMainController's execution

    Method
    Description
    void
    connect(VirtualView view)
    Allows a client to connect to the server.

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String playerIdentifier, String IDgame, String nick) throws RemoteException
      Allows a remote client to try to join a specified game.

      Might throw RuntimeExceptions if the player's nickname is unavailable, or if the selected game doesn't exist.

      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the client that is joining the game
      IDgame - The identifier of the game, chosen among the available ones
      nick - The players nickname, unique for the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication
      RuntimeException - if color or nickname are unavailable or if game doesn't exist

    • createGame

      void createGame(String playerIdentifier, int expectedPlayers, String nick) throws RemoteException
      Allows a remote client to try to create and join a new game.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the client that is creating a game
      expectedPlayers - The number of players the game is expected to handle
      nick - The nickname of the player creating the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • getAvailableGames

      void getAvailableGames(String playerIdentifier) throws RemoteException
      Asks the controller to retrieve a list of all the available games' identifier in order to allow a client to select one to join.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the client that is creating a game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • connect

      void connect(VirtualView view) throws RemoteException
      Allows a client to connect to the server.
      Parameters:
      view - a reference to the client's view (remote object)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • ping

      void ping(String playerIdentifier, boolean isAnswer) throws RemoteException
      Allows the client to send a ping message to the server.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is sending the ping message.
      isAnswer - true if the server is answering to a previous ping message, false if the server is checking on the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(String playerIdentifier) throws RemoteException
      Allows the client to inform the server that the player wants to leave the game.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is leaving the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException
